description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. Neociv is a perfect world were people only work on their passions.  But something is not right and you are scrambling for your life and the future of Neociv in this story-driven adventure game.
description.short: Neociv is a perfect world were people only work on their passions.  But something is not right and you are scrambling for your life and the future of Neociv in this story-driven adventure game.
